backend/main.mo: Motoko canister with access-controlled user profiles and checklist entry creation plus admin-only query filters and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping backend and frontend files to implemented feature IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries for major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and root layout that clears sessions when identity changes.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with logo and logout button that clears identity, cache, and admin session.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/CameraCaptureMod: Camera modal using useCamera to start/stop video, handle errors, and capture photos.
frontend/src/components/ChecklistItemCar: UI card for a checklist item that displays a captured photo and opens a camera modal to take or retake it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their name with simple form handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session credentials with persistence and crossâ€‘tab synchronization.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Wrapper around useActor that provides readiness, loading, and error states plus a retry method.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, checklist entries, and admin data, using the backend actor with error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with light and dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard fetching and filtering entries, handling session validation and backend errors.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSubmissionDetail: Displays details of a specific submission with admin session checks and backend error handling.
frontend/src/pages/LoginChoice.tsx: Login screen offering user login via Internet Identity and admin login via manual credentials.
frontend/src/pages/UserChecklist.tsx: User checklist form allowing photo capture, profile handling, and creating backend checklist entries.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Utility for storing, retrieving, and clearing admin credentials and redirect messages in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Utility for normalizing backend errors and detecting unauthorized or backend-unavailable states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the hash for routing and persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, known admin login issues, and pending feature requests related to authentication and backend connectivity.
